me.Abhigya.core.util.math.collision

Class Ray

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.math.collision.Ray

  • public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates an immutable ray having a starting position and a unit length direction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.bukkit.util.Vector direction 
      protected org.bukkit.util.Vector origin 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ray(org.bukkit.Location data)
      Constructs the ray from the provided Location, setting the origin from its position coordinates (x, y and z), and the direction from its direction.
      Ray(org.bukkit.Location origin, org.bukkit.util.Vector direction)
      Constructs the ray.
      Ray(org.bukkit.util.Vector origin, org.bukkit.util.Vector direction)
      Constructs the ray.

      • getEndPoint

        public org.bukkit.util.Vector getEndPoint(double distance)
        Returns the endpoint given the distance. This is calculated as startpoint + distance * direction.

        Parameters:
        distance - Distance from the end point to the start point
        Returns:
        Endpoint result
